article: This is a map of our school. There  _  six buildings in our school: a library,  _  office building, a classroom building, a dining hall, a sports hall and a science building. In the middle of the  _  is a big playground. The library is  _  the left of the playground near the school gate. There are many  _  , maps and computers in it. Behind the library, on the left, are the school offices. Between this building  _  the dining hall is the classroom building  _  twenty-four classrooms. On the right of the classroom building is the  _  hall. In front of the dining hall is the sports hall and the  _  in front of that is for science. There are six  _  labs and five computer rooms in the science building.
